uk.ac.glasgow.jagora

Interface StockExchange


  • public interface StockExchange
    Defines the behaviour of a stock exchange on which a variety of stocks can be traded using different types of buy and sell orders.
    Author:
    tws

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelBuyOrder(BuyOrder buyOrder) 
      void cancelSellOrder(SellOrder sellOrder) 
      void doClearing()
      Performs clearing on all stock markets hosted by this exchange.
      java.lang.Double getBestBid(Stock stock) 
      java.lang.Double getBestOffer(Stock stock) 
      java.util.List<TickEvent<Trade>> getTradeHistory(Stock stock) 
      void placeBuyOrder(BuyOrder buyOrder)
      Places a buy order on the stock exchange.
      void placeSellOrder(SellOrder sellOrder)
      Places a sell order on the stock exchange.

    • Method Detail

      • doClearing

        void doClearing()
        Performs clearing on all stock markets hosted by this exchange. Clearing will proceed until no further trades are possible.

      • placeBuyOrder

        void placeBuyOrder(BuyOrder buyOrder)
        Places a buy order on the stock exchange. If this is the first order for a stock then placing the order creates the market for that stock on the exchange.
        Parameters:
        buyOrder -

      • placeSellOrder

        void placeSellOrder(SellOrder sellOrder)
        Places a sell order on the stock exchange. If this is the first order for a stock then placing the order creates the market for that stock on the exchange.
        Parameters:
        buyOrder -

      • cancelBuyOrder

        void cancelBuyOrder(BuyOrder buyOrder)

      • cancelSellOrder

        void cancelSellOrder(SellOrder sellOrder)

      • getTradeHistory

        java.util.List<TickEvent<Trade>> getTradeHistory(Stock stock)
        Parameters:
        stock -
        Returns:
        an ordered (by execution) list of tick events for the trades that have occurred since initiation for the specified stock on this exchange.

      • getBestOffer

        java.lang.Double getBestOffer(Stock stock)
        Parameters:
        stock -
        Returns:
        the lowest priced offer for the specified stock on this exchange, or null if no offer exists or the exchange does not trade the specified stock.

      • getBestBid

        java.lang.Double getBestBid(Stock stock)
        Parameters:
        stock -
        Returns:
        the highest priced bid for the specified stock on this exchange, or null if no bid exists or the exchange does not trade the specified stock.
